ideal_referral: 1. Architects and Building Contractors – They are often involved in new constructions and renovations and can refer clients needing interior design services. 2. Real Estate Agents and Property Developers – They frequently deal with buyers and sellers who want interior design help for staging or personalization. 3. Furniture and Home Decor Stores – These businesses have customers looking to furnish or redecorate spaces, providing natural referral opportunities. 4. Local Businesses in Related Trades – Such as painters, electricians, plumbers, and carpenters, who can recommend your services to their clients during home or commercial space improvements. 5. Happy Past Clients – Word of mouth from satisfied homeowners and commercial clients is one of the strongest referral sources.
